summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for Deutsche Bank Trust Co. Americas for the period from February 1, 2019, to February 28, 2019. It details account balances, deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, indicating significant financial activity during this time.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account summary provided in the document.

keyFacts: The account balance as of February 1, 2019, was $2,923,487.56.
Total deposits and other credits during the period were $33,355,913.90.
A significant withdrawal of $11,715,363.91 occurred on February 19, 2019.
The ending balance as of February 28, 2019, was $24,564,037.55.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors in account statements.
